attributes.additional_details: Liz Truss has resigned after only 45 days as Prime Minister. She has the shortest tenure of any British Prime Minister in history. The Conservative Party have no mandate from the British People and are no longer fit to run the country. We should have a say in the leadership of the country after enduring 12 years of Tory chaos.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
